subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Knicks rallied around Jamal Crawford and Zach Randolph, fought off a late charge by the Nets and left the Izod Center with their first road victory in eight games this season.
snippet: The Knicks rallied around Jamal Crawford and Zach Randolph, fought off a late charge by the Nets and left the Izod Center with their first road victory in eight games this season.
